attributes.action: Abolition of Prime Minister expense fund.
attributes.additional_details:
We need to abolish the ex prime ministers expenses fund which was set up vby John Major when he was Prime Minister. This fund is allowing former Prime MInisters to claim uo to £500,000 a year each and is costing the state a fortune in funds it can ill afford.
While the goverment targets the disabled, the old and vunerable people in society we find that former Ministers are collecting huge sums in what can only be described as eliteist benefits.
